title: Leave no man behind
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: "You should never leave a man behind and I did. But I couldn't save him without compromising the other men."
description: Even though Les Maher believed you should never leave a man behind, there was a time in Vietnam that he had to make the decision to do so. Decades later, Maher has never forgotten and endeavoured to fulfil his promise.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002683; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Morwell veterans]; Active; 2011
